mapper.update:
update t_teacher_course_arrangement
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ca_name = #{caName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ca_type = #{caType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ca_content = #{caContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
class_time = #{classTime,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ca_status = #{caStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
schooltime = #{schooltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
syllabus_id = #{syllabusId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ca_id = #{caId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_teacher_course_arrangement set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ca_name = #{caName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ca_type = #{caType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ca_content = #{caContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, class_time = #{classTime,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ca_status = #{caStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, schooltime = #{schooltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, syllabus_id = #{syllabusId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ca_id = #{caId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select tc.ca_id, tu.real_name teaName, tl.class_name className, tc.ca_name, tc.ca_type, tc.ca_content, tc.start_time, tc.end_time, tc.class_time, tc.create_time,tc.ca_status , tc.schooltime, tc.syllabus_id
from t_teacher_course_arrangement tc ,t_user tu ,t_lqclass tl WHERE tc.class_id = tl.lq_class_id AND tc.user_id = tu.user_id AND tc.user_id = #{param}
